mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfGodMatr Generator(Generator) 2018-06-26 */ BRND_ID , SESON_CD , DSGN_GRP_NO , ERP_GOD_NO , COLOR_CD , EXPSR_SEQ , SECT_NM , ENG_SECT_NM , CHI_SECT_NM , MATR_NM , ENG_MATR_NM , CHI_MATR_NM , MIX_RT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_GOD_MATR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfGodMatr Generator(Generator) 2018-06-26 */ FROM INF_GOD_MATR WHERE 1 = 1
